Description:

Town-planning simulator with you again! Create the city of your dreams; make the right choices in life your characters! Each solution has real consequences. Invest in heavy industry, and your capital increase - but at the expense of the health of your characters, as it will degrade the environment. Implement environmentally friendly technology and improve the quality of your characters, at the risk of higher taxes and unemployment. Unite with friends to solve global issues: space shuttle launch, reducing radioactive emissions or built an amusement park. Vying for the title of the richest, most dirty, or the best place in the international and regional leaderboards!

Features Repack:

Do not cut / recoded
